languages.text: "Чем полагаться на нечестивые способы решения проблем, лучше обратиться к добрым пастырям. В Экклезиархии есть умелые экзорцисты, что умеют изгонять мрачных духов".
"Instead of relying on wicked ways to solve these problems, it would be better to turn to our good priests. There are skilled exorcists in the Ecclesiarchy who know how to drive out dark spirits."
languages.original_text: "Чем полагаться на нечестивые способы решения проблем, лучше обратиться к добрым пастырям. В Экклезиархии есть умелые экзорцисты, что умеют изгонять мрачных духов".

traits.locale_text: "Instead of relying on the wicked ways of solving problems, it would be better to turn to the good pastors. There are skilled exorcists in the Ecclesiarchy who know how to drive out dark spirits."
"Instead of relying on the wicked ways of solving problems, it would be better to turn to the good pastors. There are skilled exorcists in the Ecclesiarchy who know how to drive out dark spirits."

"Instead of relying on wicked ways to solve these problems, it would be better to turn to our good priests. There are skilled exorcists in the Ecclesiarchy who know how to drive out dark spirits."
"Instead of relying on wicked ways to solve these problems, it would be better to turn to our good priests. There are skilled exorcists in the Ecclesiarchy who know how to drive out dark spirits."

languages.text: “与其依靠邪恶的方法来解决问题，不如向我们善良的牧师求助。国教里有许多技艺精湛的驱魔人，他们知道如何驱逐那些黑暗幽灵。”
languages.original_text: "Instead of relying on wicked ways to solve these problems, it would be better to turn to our good priests. There are skilled exorcists in the Ecclesiarchy who know how to drive out dark spirits."

traits.locale_text: “与其依靠邪恶的方法来解决问题，不如向我们善良的牧师求助。国教里有许多技艺精湛的驱魔人，他们知道如何驱逐那些黑暗幽灵。”

languages.text: «En lugar de confiar en las malas artes para resolver estos problemas, sería mejor recurrir a nuestros buenos sacerdotes. Hay expertos exorcistas en la Eclesiarquía que saben cómo expulsar a los espíritus oscuros».
languages.original_text: "Instead of relying on wicked ways to solve these problems, it would be better to turn to our good priests. There are skilled exorcists in the Ecclesiarchy who know how to drive out dark spirits."

traits.locale_text: «En lugar de confiar en las malas artes para resolver estos problemas, sería mejor recurrir a nuestros buenos sacerdotes. Hay expertos exorcistas en la Eclesiarquía que saben cómo expulsar a los espíritus oscuros».

languages.text: 「これらの問題を解決するために邪悪な方法に頼るのではなく、善良な司祭に頼る方が良いのではないでしょうか。帝国聖教会には、闇の霊を追い出す方法を熟知する経験豊富なエクソシストがおります」
languages.original_text: "Instead of relying on wicked ways to solve these problems, it would be better to turn to our good priests. There are skilled exorcists in the Ecclesiarchy who know how to drive out dark spirits."

traits.locale_text: 「これらの問題を解決するために邪悪な方法に頼るのではなく、善良な司祭に頼る方が良いのではないでしょうか。帝国聖教会には、闇の霊を追い出す方法を熟知する経験豊富なエクソシストがおります」

languages.text: « Au lieu de nous en remettre à des méthodes douteuses, nous ferions mieux de nous tourner vers nos honorables prêtres. Il se trouve au sein de l'Ecclésiarchie des exorcistes chevronnés capables de chasser les esprits du mal. »
languages.original_text: "Instead of relying on wicked ways to solve these problems, it would be better to turn to our good priests. There are skilled exorcists in the Ecclesiarchy who know how to drive out dark spirits."

traits.locale_text: « Au lieu de nous en remettre à des méthodes douteuses, nous ferions mieux de nous tourner vers nos honorables prêtres. Il se trouve au sein de l'Ecclésiarchie des exorcistes chevronnés capables de chasser les esprits du mal. »

languages.text: "Anstatt diese Probleme auf bösem Wege zu lösen, sollten wir uns an unsere guten Priester wenden. Es gibt in der Ekklesiarchie fähige Exorzisten, die wissen, wie man dunkle Geister vertreibt."
languages.original_text: "Instead of relying on wicked ways to solve these problems, it would be better to turn to our good priests. There are skilled exorcists in the Ecclesiarchy who know how to drive out dark spirits."

traits.locale_text: "Anstatt diese Probleme auf bösem Wege zu lösen, sollten wir uns an unsere guten Priester wenden. Es gibt in der Ekklesiarchie fähige Exorzisten, die wissen, wie man dunkle Geister vertreibt."

languages.text: "Bu sorunları çözmek için habis yollara bel bağlamaktan ziyade erdemli rahiplerimize danışmamız daha yerinde olacaktır. Ekleşiarşi'de yetenekli iblis kovucular mevcut. Karanlık ruhları nasıl defedeceklerini bilirler."
languages.original_text: "Instead of relying on wicked ways to solve these problems, it would be better to turn to our good priests. There are skilled exorcists in the Ecclesiarchy who know how to drive out dark spirits."
